contentrichtext.text: {{refimprove|date=March 2013}} {{Infobox German Regierungsbezirk |name=Arnsberg |gname = Regierungsbezirk Arnsberg |map = NRW rbarnsberg.png |state = North Rhine-Westphalia |capital = [[Arnsberg]] |area = 8002.34 |key = 059 |population = 3802427 |population_as_of = 2002 |url = {{url|www.bezreg-arnsberg.nrw.de}} }} '''Arnsberg''' is one of the five [[Regierungsbezirk]]s of [[North Rhine-Westphalia]], [[Germany]], located in the south-east of the country. It covers the [[Sauerland]] hills as well as the east part of the [[Ruhr area]]. The region was founded in 1815 as a subdivision of the [[Prussia]]n [[Province of Westphalia]]. {{col-begin|width=auto}} {{col-break}} ''Kreise''<br>(counties) # [[Ennepe-Ruhr]] # [[Hochsauerland]] # [[Märkischer Kreis]] # [[Olpe (district)|Olpe]] # [[Siegen-Wittgenstein]] # [[Soest (district)|Soest]] # [[Unna (district)|Unna]] {{col-break|gap=2em}} ''Kreisfreie Städte''<br>(independent cities) # [[Bochum]] # [[Dortmund]] # [[Hagen]] # [[Hamm]] # [[Herne, Germany|Herne]] {{col-end}} ==References== {{Reflist}} == External links == *[http://www.bezreg-arnsberg.nrw.de Official website] {{Regierungsbezirk (North Rhine-Westphalia)}} {{coord|51.25|8.33|display=title|format=dms}} [[Category:NUTS 2 statistical regions of the European Union]] [[Category:Government regions of Prussia]] [[Category:Geography of North Rhine-Westphalia]] [[Category:States and territories established in 1815]] [[Category:1815 establishments in Prussia]] {{germany-geo-stub}}
